content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the utena district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the applicant has been awarded a 2room apartment in the basement and various household goods while the defendant has been awarded a garage a car and other items the applicant has also been ordered to pay compensation to the defendant the court has considered the financial situation of both parties and deviated from equal shares due to the defendants fault in the dissolution of the marriage the court has also allocated the costs of the proceedings between the parties the defendant has filed an appeal and the court has annulled part of the previous judgment and referred the case back to the first instance court for further evidence the court has considered the financial situation of both parties again and awarded the applicant a higher value property the court has deviated from equal shares again and ordered the defendant to pay compensation the court has also allocated the costs of the proceedings between the parties
